title: Kalpataru Projects International bags SAR 3.4 billion contracts from Aramco
description: Kalpataru Projects International Ltd bags 3.4 billion SAR contracts from Aramco to expand gas supply network in Saudi Arabia. The company signed contracts for 800 km of gas pipeline work to expand the existing network. The contracts include EPC work, a Letter of Intent, and have a contract value of Rs 7,550 crore.
